myBio: I am seeking an opportunity in the field of CS, leveraging my strong technical skills, passion for innovation, and dedication to contribute to a dynamic and collaborative work environment.

projects.projectDescription: A real-time data visualization platform for monitoring distributed systems.
An interactive web-based interface for training and testing lightweight neural models.
A RESTful API implementation focusing on high-level encryption and secure credential storage.
Automated resource scaling tool for optimizing cloud infrastructure costs and performance.
